solution_line_template: Five pounds of beef cost ${beef_price_per_pound} x {beef_pounds} = $<<{beef_price_per_pound}*{beef_pounds}={beef_total}>>{beef_total}.
So Lyra spent a total of ${chicken_price} + ${beef_total} = $<<{chicken_price}+{beef_total}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}.
Therefore, ${budget} - ${total_spent} = $<<{budget}-{total_spent}={amount_left}>>{amount_left} is left on her weekly budget.
